name: Scenic Kamikaze
description:
Avoid Obstacles and collect clams while flying upwards and gaining points.

Controls

  • D key, LMB, or touchscreen to move

Art, Sound Effects, Programming: Me

Music: My friend and Discord user Miplu#1782

Problems with Unity and Mobile

  • Yes you technically can play while on mobile 
  • there is no way to submit a score with a name input fields don't work
  • you cannot see the score text for some reason
  • its very laggy as a result of it being a web build and phones generally being weak
